name: arms
trans: n. 臂（arm的复数）；[军] 武器；纹章 v. 武装；配备（arm的三单形式） n. (Arms)人名；(英)阿姆斯

name: different
trans: adj. 不同的；个别的，与众不同的

sentences.english: The place looks completely different now.
sentences.chinese: 这地方现在完全变了。

sentences.english: They decided to try a radically different approach.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定尝试一种全然不同的办法。

sentences.english: We found women had significantly different political views from men.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现女性的政治观点与男性大不相同。

sentences.english: a slightly different way of doing things
sentences.chinese: 稍有区别的做事方法

sentences.english: What actually happened was subtly different from the PR people’s version.
sentences.chinese: 实际情况与公关部那些人的说法有细微的差别。

sentences.english: The show is refreshingly different from most exhibitions of modern art.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览与大多数现代艺术展不一样，令人耳目一新。

sentences.english: The publishing business is no different from any other business in this respect.
sentences.chinese: 从这一点来讲，出版业和其他任何行业没有什么差别。

sentences.english: It’s a different world here in London.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦这儿的情况完全不同。

detailed_translations.english: not like something or someone else, or not like before

name: eye
trans: n. 眼睛；视力；眼光；见解，观点 vt. 注视，看 n. (Eye)人名；(德)艾厄；(英)艾

sentences.english: He’s got beautiful eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他有一双漂亮的眼睛。

sentences.english: There were tears in her eyes as she listened to the story.
sentences.chinese: 她听故事时眼里噙着泪水。

sentences.english: A surgeon needs a good eye and a steady hand.
sentences.chinese: 做外科医生眼要准，手要稳。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two parts of the body that you use to see with

name: friend
trans: n. 朋友；助手；赞助者 n. (Friend)人名；(英)弗兰德

sentences.english: Jerry, this is my friend Sue.
sentences.chinese: 杰里，这是我的朋友休。

sentences.english: She’s always out with her friends.
sentences.chinese: 她常同朋友们一起出去。

sentences.english: One of her closest friends died at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 她的一位密友周末过世了。

sentences.english: I met Jim through a friend.
sentences.chinese: 经一位朋友介绍，我认识了吉姆。

detailed_translations.english: someone who you know and like very much and enjoy spending time with

name: leg
trans: n. 腿；支柱

sentences.english: a young boy with skinny legs
sentences.chinese: 双腿干瘦的小男孩

sentences.english: She fell and broke her leg.
sentences.chinese: 她摔断了腿。

detailed_translations.english: one of the long parts of your body that your feet are joined to, or a similar part on an animal or insect

name: space
trans: n. 空间；太空；距离 vi. 留间隔 vt. 隔开

sentences.english: How much space is there on each disk?
sentences.chinese: 每张磁盘有多大容量？

sentences.english: The hedge takes up too much space .
sentences.chinese: 这树篱占了太多的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of an area, room, container etc that is empty or available to be used

name: airplane
trans: n. 飞机

sentences.english: The airplane cracked up in landing.
sentences.chinese: 这架飞机在着陆时坠毁。

sentences.english: The new airplane flies at twice the speed of sound.
sentences.chinese: 这架新式飞机以两倍于音速的速度飞行。

sentences.english: We beamed the airplane down safely.
sentences.chinese: 我们给飞机导航使它安全降落。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that flies through the air and has one or more engines

name: grow
trans: vi. 发展；生长；渐渐变得… vt. 使生长；种植；扩展 n. (Grow)人名；(英)格罗

sentences.english: Support for Mr Thompson is growing.
sentences.chinese: 汤普森先生的支持率在上升。

sentences.english: a tree which will grow well in most types of soil
sentences.chinese: 在大部分土壤里都能生长得很好的一种树

detailed_translations.english: to become bigger, taller etc over a period of time in the process of becoming an adult

name: machine
trans: n. 机械，机器；机构；机械般工作的人 vt. 用机器制造 n. (Machine)人名；(意)马基内

sentences.english: Could you get me a coffee from the drinks machine ?
sentences.chinese: 给我从自动饮料机里买一罐咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: The fax machine is broken.
sentences.chinese: 传真机坏了。

sentences.english: Did you put my dirty shirts in the machine (= washing machine ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你把我的脏衬衫放进洗衣机里了吗？

sentences.english: I left a message for you on your machine (= telephone answering machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 我在你的电话答录机里留了言。

sentences.english: The machine wouldn’t let me have any money (= cash machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 自动取款机不让我取钱。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job

name: place
trans: n. 地方；住所；座位 vt. 放置；任命；寄予 vi. 名列前茅；取得名次 n. (Place)人名；(罗)普拉切；(法)普拉斯；(英)普莱斯

sentences.english: Make sure you keep the key in a safe place.
sentences.chinese: 一定要把钥匙放在安全的地方。

sentences.english: I’ve spent the day dashing about from place to place.
sentences.chinese: 我这一天尽是在东奔西跑。

sentences.english: The place was full of screaming children.
sentences.chinese: 那地方全是大叫大嚷的孩子们。

sentences.english: He was threatening to burn the place down.
sentences.chinese: 他扬言要把那地方烧毁。

sentences.english: She had never been back to the place where the accident happened.
sentences.chinese: 她再也没回过事故发生的地点。

sentences.english: The theatre bar was our usual meeting place.
sentences.chinese: 这个剧院酒吧是我们见面的老地方。

sentences.english: We were living then in a place called Alberiga.
sentences.chinese: 那时候我们住在一个叫阿尔伯里格的地方。

sentences.english: The wall was quite damp in places (= in some places ) .
sentences.chinese: 墙上有几处很潮湿。

sentences.english: Did the accident happen at your place of work (= the place where you work ) ?
sentences.chinese: 事故是在你的工作地点发生的吗？

sentences.english: It took us ages to find a place to live.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了好长时间才找到一个住处。

detailed_translations.english: a space or area, for example a particular point on a surface or in a room, building, town, city etc

name: trick
trans: n. 诡计；恶作剧；窍门；花招；骗局；欺诈 vt. 欺骗；哄骗；装饰；打扮 vi. 哄骗；戏弄 adj. 特技的；欺诈的；有决窍的 n. (Trick)人名；(英)特里克

sentences.english: Pretending he doesn’t remember is an old trick of his.
sentences.chinese: 假装不记得是他的老花招了。

sentences.english: He didn’t really lose his wallet - that’s just a trick.
sentences.chinese: 他并没有真的丢了钱包——这只是一个骗局。

sentences.english: The trick is to bend your knees as you catch the ball.
sentences.chinese: 诀窍是接球时要屈膝。

sentences.english: She knew she’d been tricked, but it was too late.
sentences.chinese: 她知道自己被骗了，但为时已晚。

detailed_translations.english: something you do in order to deceive someone
to deceive someone in order to get something from them or to make them do something

name: way
trans: n. 方法；道路；方向；行业；习惯 adv. 大大地；远远地 adj. 途中的 n. (Way)人名；(中)见 Wei；(英、缅)韦

sentences.english: My family was in a bad way financially.
sentences.chinese: 我家当时经济窘迫。

sentences.english: The chicken’s nice and crispy – just the way I like it.
sentences.chinese: 这鸡肉很脆，正是我喜欢的口味。

sentences.english: It’s worth thinking how you can improve the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 你应该想想如何让现状变得更好。

detailed_translations.english: a particular state or condition

name: big
trans: adj. 大的；重要的；量大的 adv. 大量地；顺利；夸大地 n. (Big)人名；(土)比格

sentences.english: a big house
sentences.chinese: 大房子

sentences.english: I need a bigger desk.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一张大一点的桌子。

sentences.english: She had a big grin on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上挂着大大的笑容。

sentences.english: a big increase in crime
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率的大幅上升

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the biggest city in California.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是加利福尼亚最大的城市。

sentences.english: The garage isn’t big enough for two cars.
sentences.chinese: 这个车库不够大，停不下两辆汽车。

sentences.english: When they lose, they lose in a big way (=  to a large degree  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要输就输得很惨。

sentences.english: There was this great big (=  extremely big  ) spider in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里有只特大的蜘蛛。

detailed_translations.english: of more than average size or amount

name: blue
trans: adj. 蓝色的；忧郁的，悲观的；（由于冷或呼吸困难）发青的，青紫的；（电影、玩笑或故事）色情的，黄色的；（肉）未熟的；（政治上）保守的 n. 蓝色；蓝色物品；（牛津或剑桥大学的运动员）蓝色荣誉者；失误；红发人；打架 vt. （使）变成蓝色；把......染成蓝色；给……上蓝色漂白剂；挥霍（钱财） n. (Blue) （英、美、加、澳、新）布卢（人名）

sentences.english: the blue waters of the lake
sentences.chinese: 蓝蓝的湖水

sentences.english: She nearly always dresses in blue.
sentences.chinese: 她几乎总是穿蓝色的衣服。

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day
the colour of the sky or the sea on a fine day

name: brown
trans: adj. 棕色的，褐色的；太阳晒黑的 vi. 变成褐色 n. 褐色，棕色 vt. 使变成褐色 n. (Brown)人名；(英、意、芬、捷、德、法、西、葡)布朗

sentences.english: This particular model is available in brown, white, or grey.
sentences.chinese: 这个型号的产品有棕色、白色和灰色的。

sentences.english: the browns and greens of the landscape
sentences.chinese: 棕绿相映的风景

detailed_translations.english: the colour of earth, wood, or coffee

name: earthworm
trans: n. [无脊椎] 蚯蚓

sentences.english: The earthworm is a useful animal. On the ground it is food for other animals. Under the ground, it makes rich soil for fields and gardens.
sentences.chinese: 蚯蚓是一种有益的动物。在地面上它是其他动物的食物。在地下，它为田园和花园制造肥沃的土壤。

sentences.english: But when genetic characterization of the contents of beetle guts gave some unexpected results, the researchers decided to take a closer look at earthworm DNA.
sentences.chinese: 但是，当甲虫背脊骨包容的遗传特性显示出一些意想不到的结果时，这些研究人员决定仔细查明蚯蚓的DNA。

sentences.english: Germination is complicated with the bursting forth of a meteor and with the peck of a swallow cracking its egg, and it places on one level the birth of an earthworm and the advent of Socrates.
sentences.chinese: 万物的化育是复杂的，有风云雷电诸天象，有破壳而出的乳燕，一条蚯蚓的出生和苏格拉底的来临同属于化育之列。

detailed_translations.english: a common type of long thin brown worm that lives in soil

name: plant
trans: n. 工厂，车间；植物；设备；庄稼 vt. 种植；培养；栽培；安置 vi. 种植 n. (Plant)人名；(英、西、意)普兰特；(法)普朗

sentences.english: Don’t forget to water the plants.
sentences.chinese: 别忘记给植物浇水。

sentences.english: a huge chemical plant
sentences.chinese: 一座大型化工厂

sentences.english: Residents have helped us plant trees.
sentences.chinese: 居民们帮助我们种了树。

detailed_translations.english: a living thing that has leaves and roots and grows in earth, especially one that is smaller than a tree
to put plants or seeds in the ground to grow

name: red
trans: adj. 红的，红色的；（毛发）红褐色的；（脸）涨红的；（眼睛）红肿的；革命的，激进的；（人）红种的；（纸牌中）红桃的，红方块的；（葡萄酒）红的；（表示停止）红（灯），红（旗）；被禁止的，危险的；（滑雪道上用红色标志指示）第二高难度的；（物理）表示夸克三种颜色之一的红色；赤色的（尤指冷战期间用于指前苏联）；沾有鲜血的；（古或诗/文）流血的；（科萨人）来自传统部落文化的 n. 红色，红颜料；红衣；红葡萄酒；红色物（或人）；赤字，亏空；激进分子 n. (Red) 雷德（人名）

sentences.english: We painted the door bright red .
sentences.chinese: 我们把门漆成鲜红色。

sentences.english: a red balloon
sentences.chinese: 一个红气球

sentences.english: I like the way the artist uses red in this painting.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢画家在这幅作品中对红色的运用。

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of blood
the colour of blood

name: ring
trans: n. 戒指；环状物；圆形；圆形竞技场（或表演场）； 炉口；（非法的）团伙；铃声；（鸟的）腿环；行星光环；环形护城工事；肛门；围成一圈的人（或物）；感觉 v. 打电话；发出铃声；回响；充满；嗡嗡作响；（通过按铃）要求服务；听上去（有某种印象）；报（时）；包围；圈起来 n. (Ring) （美、挪、德、爱、英、波、丹）林（人名）

detailed_translations.english: a small square area surrounded by ropes, where people  box  or  wrestle

name: small
trans: adj. 少的，小的；微弱的；几乎没有的；不重要的；幼小的 adv. 小小地；卑鄙地 n. 小件物品；矮小的人 n. (Small)人名；(英)斯莫尔

sentences.english: a small piece of paper
sentences.chinese: 一小片纸

sentences.english: a small car
sentences.chinese: 一辆小汽车

sentences.english: a small town
sentences.chinese: 小镇

sentences.english: a small dark woman
sentences.chinese: 一个皮肤黝黑的小个子女人

sentences.english: The T-shirt was too small for him.
sentences.chinese: 这件 T 恤衫他穿太小了。

sentences.english: The sweater comes in three sizes - small, medium and large.
sentences.chinese: 这羊毛衫有三个尺寸: 小号、中号和大号。

sentences.english: Only a relatively small number of people were affected.
sentences.chinese: 只有相对少数的人受到了影响。

sentences.english: a small amount of money
sentences.chinese: 一小笔钱

sentences.english: A much smaller proportion of women are employed in senior positions.
sentences.chinese: 受雇担任高级职位的女性比例要小得多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 少的，小的；微弱的；几乎没有的；不重要的；幼小的
detailed_translations.english: not large in size or amount

name: soil
trans: n. 土地；土壤；国家；粪便；务农；温床 vt. 弄脏；污辱 vi. 变脏

sentences.english: She moistenend  the soil round the plant.
sentences.chinese: 她把植物周围的土壤弄湿。

detailed_translations.english: to make something dirty, especially with waste from your body
to make something dirty, especially with waste from your body

name: bird
trans: n. 鸟；家伙；羽毛球 vt. 向…喝倒彩；起哄 vi. 猎鸟；观察研究野鸟 n. (Bird)人名；(英、西)伯德

sentences.english: wild birds
sentences.chinese: 野鸟

sentences.english: The dawn was filled with the sound of birds.
sentences.chinese: 黎明时分，鸟鸣声不绝于耳。

sentences.english: a flock of birds
sentences.chinese: 一群飞鸟

sentences.english: a wooden bird cage
sentences.chinese: 木制鸟笼

detailed_translations.english: a creature with wings and feathers that can usually fly. Many birds sing and build nests, and female birds lay eggs

name: black
trans: adj. 黑色的；黑人的；邪恶的 n. 黑色；黑人；黑颜料 vt. 使变黑；把鞋油等涂在…上；把（眼眶）打成青肿 vi. 变黑 n. (Black)人名；(英、西)布莱克；(德、葡、捷)布拉克

sentences.english: a black evening dress
sentences.chinese: 黑色晚礼服

sentences.english: It was still pitch black (= very dark ) out.
sentences.chinese: 外面依然一片漆黑。

detailed_translations.english: having the darkest colour, like coal or night

name: cold
trans: adj. 寒冷的；冷淡的，不热情的；失去知觉的 n. 寒冷；感冒 adv. 完全地

sentences.english: She splashed her face with cold water.
sentences.chinese: 她往脸上泼冷水。

sentences.english: a blast of cold air
sentences.chinese: 一股冷空气

sentences.english: We slept on the cold ground.
sentences.chinese: 我们睡在冰冷的地上。

sentences.english: The house felt cold and empty.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里感觉很冷，空荡荡的。

sentences.english: Martin was really cold towards me at the party.
sentences.chinese: 马丁在聚会上对我非常冷淡。

sentences.english: I was shivering with cold.
sentences.chinese: 我冷得发抖。

detailed_translations.english: something that is cold has a low temperature
a low temperature or cold weather

name: penguin
trans: n. 企鹅；空军地勤人员

sentences.english: He asked some birds if they knew where the penguin came from. But they ignored him.
sentences.chinese: 他去问小鸟们，知不知道小企鹅是从哪里来的啊，可是她们却睬都不睬他。

sentences.english: Perhaps we cannot relate to the severe conditions enduring by the Emperor penguin, but each of us knows what it means to sit on our own versions of ice and egg.
sentences.chinese: 可能我们无法理解国王企鹅所忍受的严酷环境与我们有何关联，但我们每一个人都知道在冰上孵育自己的蛋代表什么意思。

detailed_translations.english: a large black and white Antarctic sea bird, which cannot fly but uses its wings for swimming

name: swim
trans: vi. 游泳；漂浮；浸；眩晕 vt. 游过；使浮起 n. 游泳；漂浮；眩晕 adj. 游泳时穿戴的

sentences.english: Let’s go swimming this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午我们游泳去吧。

sentences.english: kids learning to swim the backstroke
sentences.chinese: 学习仰泳的孩子们

sentences.english: She was the first woman to swim the Channel.
sentences.chinese: 她是第一个游过英吉利海峡的女性。

detailed_translations.english: to move yourself through water using your arms and legs
a period of time that you spend swimming

name: white
trans: adj. 白色的；白种的；纯洁的 n. 白色；洁白；白种人

sentences.english: young white males
sentences.chinese: 年轻的白种男性

detailed_translations.english: belonging to the race of people with pale skin

name: climb
trans: v. 爬；攀登；上升；（植物沿墙或架子）攀缘生长；晋升；（道路）倾斜向上；爬升；费力爬进（或爬出） n. 爬；攀登；增值；（职位或社会地位的）提高；（名次的）攀升；（登山或攀缘运动中要爬的）山；山道；（飞机的）爬升

sentences.english: Harry climbed the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 哈里爬上楼梯。

sentences.english: Boys were climbing trees along the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在河边爬树。

detailed_translations.english: to move up, down, or across something using your feet and hands, especially when this is difficult to do
to move up, down, or across something using your feet and hands, especially when this is difficult to do

name: egg
trans: n. 蛋；卵子；家伙；鸡蛋 vt. 煽动；怂恿 n. (Egg)人名；(法、英)埃格

sentences.english: Blackbirds lay their eggs in March.
sentences.chinese: 乌鸫在3月产蛋。

sentences.english: an ostrich egg
sentences.chinese: 鸵鸟蛋

sentences.english: The eggs hatch (= break open to allow the baby out ) in 26 days.
sentences.chinese: 这些蛋要26天才能孵化。

sentences.english: Joe always has bacon and egg for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 乔早餐总是吃熏肉加蛋。

detailed_translations.english: a round object with a hard surface, that contains a baby bird, snake, insect etc and which is produced by a female bird, snake, insect etc

name: eight
trans: num. 八；八个；第八；八岁；八点 adj. 八的 n. 八人划船队

sentences.english: It’s only eight days till Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 还有8天就到圣诞节了。

sentences.english: They woke at eight (= eight o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 他们是8点钟醒的。

sentences.english: My parents died when I was eight (= eight years old ).
sentences.chinese: 我8岁时父母就去世了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 8

name: lay
trans: vt. 躺下；产卵；搁放；放置；铺放；涂，敷 adj. 世俗的；外行的；没有经验的 n. 位置；短诗；花纹方向；叙事诗；性伙伴 vi. 下蛋；打赌 v. 躺；位于（lie的过去式）

sentences.english: He laid his hand on my shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 他把一只手搭在我的肩上。

sentences.english: They laid a wreath at the place where so many people died.
sentences.chinese: 他们在这么多人丧生的地方放了一个花圈。

sentences.english: Lay the material flat on the table.
sentences.chinese: 把布料平铺在桌上。

detailed_translations.chinese: 躺下；产卵；搁放；放置；铺放；涂，敷
detailed_translations.english: to put someone or something down carefully into a flat position

detailed_translations.chinese: 世俗的；外行的；没有经验的
detailed_translations.english: not trained or not knowing much about a particular profession or subject

detailed_translations.chinese: 位置；短诗；花纹方向；叙事诗；性伙伴
detailed_translations.english: a poem or song

name: silk
trans: n. 丝绸；蚕丝；丝织物 adj. 丝的；丝绸的；丝制的 vi. （玉米）处于长须的阶段中 n. (Silk)人名；(英、瑞典)西尔克

sentences.english: pure silk stockings
sentences.chinese: 生丝面料的漂亮连衣裙

detailed_translations.english: a thin smooth soft cloth made from very thin thread which is produced by a silkworm

name: spider
trans: n. 蜘蛛；设圈套者；三脚架

sentences.english: Do you think that the spider can web anything?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得这蜘蛛能用网捕住什么吗?

sentences.english: Why not hold spider of the week contests in your home throughout this season?
sentences.chinese: 在这整个蜘蛛出没的季节里，为什么不在你家里举行蜘蛛周竞赛？

sentences.english: Likewise, by these investigators’ logic, male arachnophobes should get a mild tickle down there whenever they spy a spider scurrying across their desk.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，按这些研究者的逻辑，男性蜘蛛恐惧者每次看到蜘蛛爬过桌子都应该下身瘙痒咯？

detailed_translations.english: a small creature with eight legs, which catches insects using a fine network of sticky threads

name: chase
trans: vt. 追逐；追捕；试图赢得；雕镂 vi. 追逐；追赶；奔跑 n. 追逐；追赶；追击 n. (Chase)人名；(英)蔡斯；(法)沙斯

sentences.english: The dogs saw him running and chased him.
sentences.chinese: 那些狗看到他在跑就追他。

sentences.english: kids chasing around the house
sentences.chinese: 在屋里追逐嬉戏的孩子们

detailed_translations.chinese: 追逐， 追赶， 追求
detailed_translations.english: to quickly follow someone or something in order to catch them

name: dog
trans: n. 狗；卑鄙的人；(俚)朋友 vt. 跟踪；尾随

sentences.english: I could hear a dog barking .
sentences.chinese: 我听到了狗吠声。

sentences.english: He’s taken the dog for a walk .
sentences.chinese: 他去遛狗了。

sentences.english: We used to have a dog when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 我小时候我们养过狗。

sentences.english: the most popular breed of dog
sentences.chinese: 最受人喜欢的犬种

detailed_translations.english: a common animal with four legs, fur, and a tail. Dogs are kept as pets or trained to guard places, find drugs etc.

name: people
trans: n. 人；人类；民族；公民 vt. 居住于；使住满人

sentences.english: How many people were at the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 有多少人到会？

sentences.english: At least 40 people were killed.
sentences.chinese: 至少有40人遇害。

sentences.english: He pledged that he would never lie to the American people.
sentences.chinese: 他保证绝不对美国人民撒谎。

detailed_translations.english: used as the plural of ‘person’ to refer to men, women, and children

name: sister
trans: n. 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士 adj. 姐妹般的；同类型的

sentences.english: Janet and Abby are sisters.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮特和阿比是两姐妹。

sentences.english: He has two sisters and a brother.
sentences.chinese: 他有两个姊妹和一个弟弟。

sentences.english: She’s my twin sister .
sentences.chinese: 她是我的孪生妹妹。

sentences.english: ...the International Monetary Fund and its sister organization, the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: …国际货币基金组织和它的姐妹机构，世界银行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士
detailed_translations.english: a girl or woman who has the same parents as you
You can use sister to describe something that is of the same type or is connected in some way to another thing you have mentioned. For example, if a company has a sister company, they are connected.

name: think
trans: vt. 想；认为；想起；想像；打算 vi. 想；认为 n. 想；想法 adj. 思想的

sentences.english: I thought I heard something.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我听到了什么声音。

sentences.english: He didn’t think anyone would believe him.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得没人会相信他。

sentences.english: Do you think I should call him?
sentences.chinese: 你认为我应该打电话给他吗？

sentences.english: For some reason, I keep thinking it’s Friday today.
sentences.chinese: 不知为什么，我总觉得今天是周五。

sentences.english: The recession lasted longer than anyone thought it would.
sentences.chinese: 谁也没有想到这次经济萧条会持续这么久。

sentences.english: Am I right in thinking that you have a brother?
sentences.chinese: 我想你是有个兄弟的，对吗？

sentences.english: I can’t help thinking that he’s made a mistake.
sentences.chinese: 我总觉得他弄错了。

sentences.english: Do you honestly think I would do something so stupid?
sentences.chinese: 你真认为我会做这么愚蠢的事吗？

sentences.english: We must start thinking in terms of reducing costs.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须开始考虑降低成本了。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular opinion or to believe that something is true
to think about a problem or question

name: beaver
trans: n. 海狸；海狸皮毛 n. (Beaver)人名；(英)比弗

sentences.english: ...a coat with a huge beaver collar.
sentences.chinese: …一件带有大海狸毛皮领的大衣。

detailed_translations.english: a North American animal that has thick fur and a wide flat tail, and cuts down trees with its teeth

name: eagle
trans: n. 鹰；鹰状标饰 n. (Eagle)人名；(英)伊格尔

sentences.english: The eagle drooped its wings.
sentences.chinese: 那只鹰收拢双翅做俯冲。

sentences.english: Maybe they could not hold on to the arrival of the spring, but the female eagle thought what if their father could bring back the food?
sentences.chinese: 它们或许已经挨不到春天的到来了。 雌鹰这样想，但如果它们的爸爸会把食物带来呢？

sentences.english: She lacks the skill to accomplish this, but recognizes that an eagle can help her.
sentences.chinese: 她缺乏完成这项任务的能力，不过她认识到老鹰可以帮助她。

detailed_translations.english: a very large strong bird with a beak like a hook that eats small animals, birds etc

name: goose
trans: n. 鹅；鹅肉；傻瓜；雌鹅 vt. 突然加大油门；嘘骂 n. (Goose)人名；(德)戈泽；(英)古斯

sentences.english: ...roast goose.
sentences.chinese: …烤鹅。

detailed_translations.english: the cooked meat of this bird

name: live
trans: v. 居住；生存，活着；生活；留存，铭记；生长，栖息；以……为生；（船）未沉没；放置，搁置；享受精彩生活；经历，度过 adj. 活的；实况转播的，现场表演的；通电的；仍可爆炸的；燃烧着的；含乳酸菌的；时下重大的；有效的；（机器中轮或轴）转动的；处于比赛状态的；生动的，精力充沛的 n. (Live)（挪、芬、印、俄、美、荷）利夫（人名）

sentences.english: He lives just across the street from me.
sentences.chinese: 他就住在我街对面。

sentences.english: We live only a few miles from the coast.
sentences.chinese: 我们住的地方离海边只有几英里远。

sentences.english: A rather odd family came tolive next door to us.
sentences.chinese: 有一户相当奇怪的人家搬到了我们隔壁。

sentences.english: As soon as I saw the place, I knew I didn’t want to live there.
sentences.chinese: 我一看到那地方，就觉得不想住在那儿。

sentences.english: Does Paul stilllive here?
sentences.chinese: 保罗还住在这儿吗？

sentences.english: We’re still looking for somewhere to live.
sentences.chinese: 我们还在找住的地方。

sentences.english: They’ve finally found a place to live.
sentences.chinese: 他们终于找到了住的地方。

sentences.english: Most seventeen-year-olds still live at home(= live with their parents ).
sentences.chinese: 17 岁的孩子大都还住在家里。

sentences.english: I’m quite happy living alone.
sentences.chinese: 我一个人住很开心。

sentences.english: The house has 3,600 square feet of living space(= the areas of a house you live in ).
sentences.chinese: 这房子有3,600平方英尺的居住空间。

detailed_translations.english: if you live in a place, you have your home there
not dead or artificial

name: loon
trans: n. [鸟] 潜鸟；懒人；笨蛋 n. (Loon)人名；(英、瑞典)隆

name: moose
trans: n. [脊椎] 驼鹿；麋 [ 复数 moose ]

sentences.english: So did we encounter our bear, or a moose?
sentences.chinese: 那么，我们到底遇到了熊或者麋鹿吗？

sentences.english: On the islands of the Kronotsky river, wild reindeer and moose coexist with bears.
sentences.chinese: 在克罗诺茨基河畔，驼鹿，驯鹿还有棕熊这三种动物和平共处。

sentences.english: Except for the moose wandering down the road.
sentences.chinese: 除了你可以看到麋鹿在马路上游逛。

detailed_translations.english: a large brown animal like a  deer  that has very large flat  antler s (= horns that grow like branches )  and lives in North America, northern Europe, and parts of Asia

name: defend
trans: vt. 辩护；防护 vi. 保卫；防守

sentences.chinese: 她在女儿面前总是为丈夫辩解。

sentences.english: Students should be ready to explain and defend their views.
sentences.chinese: 学生应该勇于为自己的观点进行解释和辩护。

detailed_translations.english: to use arguments to protect something or someone from criticism, or to prove that something is right

sentences.chinese: 事故中有人受伤吗？

sentences.chinese: 我不是故意要伤害你的感情。

detailed_translations.english: to injure yourself or someone else

name: jellyfish
trans: n. 水母；[无脊椎] 海蜇；软弱无能的人

sentences.chinese: 但是，多年来，许多海洋专家一直在说，我们需要开始热爱水母——因为在不远的将来，它们也许是我们周围最丰富的海洋物种。

sentences.english: Mr. Loughlin and others at the beach said it took a while for everyone to realize what was happening, because jellyfish stings are so rare at the beach.
sentences.chinese: 洛夫林先生和其他在海滩上的人说，过了好一会儿，大家才意识到发生了什么，因为水母蜇人在这片海滩上实属罕见。

detailed_translations.english: a sea animal that has a round transparent body and can sting you

name: safe
trans: adj. 安全的；可靠的；平安的 n. 保险箱；冷藏室；纱橱 n. (Safe)人名；(几)萨菲

sentences.english: She doesn’t feel safe in the house on her own.
sentences.chinese: 她独自一人在家感到不安全。

sentences.english: Make sure you keep these documents safe .
sentences.chinese: 你一定要妥善保管这些文件。

detailed_translations.english: not in danger of being harmed, lost, or stolen
a strong metal box or cupboard with special locks where you keep money and valuable things

name: sting
trans: n. 刺痛；讽刺，刺激；刺毛 vt. 刺；驱使；使…苦恼；使…疼痛 vi. 刺痛；被刺痛；感到剧痛 n. (Sting)人名；(英)斯廷；(德)施廷

sentences.chinese: 她感觉泪水刺痛了眼睛。

sentences.english: He was stung by a bee.
sentences.chinese: 他被蜜蜂蜇了。

detailed_translations.english: a sharp pain in your eyes or skin, caused by being hit, by smoke etc

trans: n. 黄蜂；[昆] 胡蜂；易怒的人 vi. 黄蜂似的直扑

sentences.chinese: 黄蜂蜇了我的手臂。

sentences.english: Years of dealing with plasters and wasp stings on the beach mean handbags and subsequently backpacks are stuffed with remedies.
sentences.chinese: 和药膏和沙滩上黄蜂叮咬打了多年交道，结果是我的手提包和背包里塞满了药物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 黄蜂；[昆] 胡蜂；易怒的人
detailed_translations.english: a thin black and yellow flying insect that can sting you

name: bloom
trans: n. 花；青春；旺盛 vt. 使开花；使茂盛 vi. 开花；茂盛 n. (Bloom)人名；(瑞典、西)布洛姆；(英)布卢姆

sentences.chinese: 这些植物在春天开花。

sentences.english: They bloom for a month and fade away in no time.
sentences.chinese: 它们开花为一个月的时间和逐渐消失很快。

sentences.english: We noticed that these women began to bloom into greater self-confidence and even to shed unhealthy relationships. At that point we knew we were onto something big.
sentences.chinese: 我们注意到，这些妇女开始开花到更大的自信，甚至摆脱不健康的关系。在这一点上，我们知道我们正在做一件大事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 花，开花，开花期；青春焕发
detailed_translations.english: a flower or flowers

name: come
trans: vi. 来；开始；出现；发生；变成；到达 vt. 做；假装；将满（…岁） int. 嗨！ n. (Come)人名；(英)科姆；(阿尔巴)乔梅

sentences.english: Let me know when they come.
sentences.chinese: 他们来了就告诉我。

sentences.english: Can you come here for a minute?
sentences.chinese: 你到这里来一会儿好吗？

sentences.english: Come a bit closer and you’ll be able to see better.
sentences.chinese: 靠近一些就能看得更清楚。

sentences.english: What time will you be coming home ?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时候能回家？

name: cycle
trans: n. 循环；周期；自行车；整套；一段时间 vt. 使循环；使轮转 vi. 循环；骑自行车；轮转

sentences.english: a woman’s menstrual cycle
sentences.chinese: 女性的月经周期

detailed_translations.chinese: 自行车、 摩托车； 循环
detailed_translations.english: a number of related events that happen again and again in the same order

name: sprout
trans: vi. 发芽；长芽 vt. 使发芽；使萌芽 n. 芽；萌芽；苗芽 n. (Sprout)人名；(英)斯普劳特

sentences.english: Move the pots outside when the seeds begin to sprout.
sentences.chinese: 种子开始发芽时把盆搬到外面去。

sentences.english: Trees were starting to sprout new leaves.
sentences.chinese: 树上开始抽出新叶。

detailed_translations.english: if vegetables, seeds, or plants sprout, they start to grow, producing  shoots  ,  buds  , or leaves

name: wait
trans: vt. 等候；推迟；延缓 vi. 等待；耽搁；伺候用餐 n. 等待；等候 n. (Wait)人名；(英)韦特；(捷)魏特

sentences.english: Hurry up! Everyone’s waiting.
sentences.chinese: 快点！大家在等着呢。

sentences.english: Would you mind waiting outside?
sentences.chinese: 你在外面等好吗？

sentences.english: We’ve been waiting ages.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经等了很长时间了。

detailed_translations.english: to stay somewhere or not do something until something else happens, someone arrives etc
a period of time in which you wait for something to happen, someone to arrive etc

name: fair
trans: adj. 公平的；美丽的，白皙的；[气象] 晴朗的 adv. 公平地；直接地；清楚地 vi. 转晴 n. 展览会；市集；美人 n. (Fair)人名；(英、芬)费尔

sentences.english: a fair maiden
sentences.chinese: 美丽的少女

detailed_translations.english: pleasant and attractive

name: favorite
trans: adj. （同类中）最受喜爱的（等于 favourite） n. 受喜爱的人（或事物）；（比赛或竞赛中）最有希望的获胜者；收藏夹（等于 favourite） v. 把……添加到收藏夹（等于 favourite） n. (Favorite) （美）费沃里特（人名）

sentences.english: It is one of my favorite novels.
sentences.chinese: 这是我最喜爱的一本小说。

sentences.english: This anemone is one of my favorite plants.
sentences.chinese: 这朵银莲花是我最喜爱的植物之一。

sentences.english: His favorite fruits and vegetables as well as 55 lb. of bamboo will be on board for nourishment.
sentences.chinese: 除了它最喜爱的水果和蔬菜以外还有55磅的竹子将会作为它在飞机上的食物。

name: giant
trans: n. 巨人；伟人；巨大的动物；巨型植物；大公司；（天文）巨星； adj. 巨大的；巨人般的；伟大的

sentences.english: a giant electronics company
sentences.chinese: 一家电子产品巨头

sentences.english: a giant tortoise
sentences.chinese: 巨龟

detailed_translations.english: extremely big, and much bigger than other things of the same type

detailed_translations.chinese: 巨人，巨物；才智超群的人
detailed_translations.english: an extremely tall strong man, who is often bad and cruel, in children’s stories

name: painted

name: tiny
trans: adj. 微小的；很少的 n. (Tiny)人名；(葡、印)蒂尼

sentences.english: a tiny community in the Midwest
sentences.chinese: 中西部地区一个极小的社区

sentences.english: The earrings were tiny.
sentences.chinese: 耳环很小。

sentences.english: a tiny little baby
sentences.chinese: 丁点大的婴儿

sentences.english: She always felt a tiny bit sad.
sentences.chinese: 她总是感到一丝悲伤。

sentences.english: Bad teachers are a tiny minority .
sentences.chinese: 差老师只占极少数。

sentences.english: tiny pieces of paper
sentences.chinese: 碎纸屑片

detailed_translations.english: extremely small

trans: n. 车轮；方向盘；转动 vt. 转动；使变换方向；给…装轮子 vi. 旋转；突然转变方向；盘旋飞行

sentences.english: Shall I take the wheel (= drive instead of someone else )?
